files..github/workflows/ci.yml:
name: CI
permissions: {}

on:
  push:
    branches: [main]
  pull_request:
    branches: [main]

# Automatically cancel in-progress actions on the same branch
concurrency:
  group: ${{ github.workflow }}-${{ github.event_name == 'pull_request_target' && github.head_ref || github.ref }}
  cancel-in-progress: true

env:
  NODE_VERSION: 20

jobs:
  test:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@08c6903cd8c0fde910a37f88322edcfb5dd907a8 # v5.0.0
        with:
          persist-credentials: false
      - uses: pnpm/action-setup@41ff72655975bd51cab0327fa583b6e92b6d3061 # v4.2.0
      - uses: actions/setup-node@a0853c24544627f65ddf259abe73b1d18a591444 # v5.0.0
        with:
          node-version: ${{ env.NODE_VERSION }}
          cache: pnpm
      - run: pnpm i
      - run: pnpm t

  lint:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@08c6903cd8c0fde910a37f88322edcfb5dd907a8 # v5.0.0
        with:
          persist-credentials: false
      - uses: pnpm/action-setup@41ff72655975bd51cab0327fa583b6e92b6d3061 # v4.2.0
      - uses: actions/setup-node@a0853c24544627f65ddf259abe73b1d18a591444 # v5.0.0
        with:
          node-version: ${{ env.NODE_VERSION }}
          cache: pnpm
      - run: pnpm i
      - run: pnpm lint
files.README.md:
# Astro Embed

Welcome! This project aims to collect easy-to-use and lightweight ways to embed common media into your [Astro](https://astro.build/) site.

## üìö Documentation

Want to get started using some embed components?

Check out the [`astro-embed` documentation](https://astro-embed.netlify.app/)

## üöÄ Project Structure

This project uses a monorepo structure with a separate workspace for each embed type. You‚Äôll find a directory for each service in the [`/packages`](packages) directory.

The Astro site in the [`/demo`](demo) directory can be used to preview the various components and the files in [`/tests`](tests) are used to run automated testing on the components.

## üßû Commands

All commands are run from the root of the project, from a terminal:

| Command        | Action                |
| :------------- | :-------------------- |
| `pnpm install` | Installs dependencies |
| `pnpm t`       | Run the test suite    |

## üß™ Testing

You can run unit tests by running `pnpm t` in a terminal or run `pnpm start` in the `demo/` directory to start a dev server for the demo project.

## ‚ú® Want to contribute?

This is an Astro Community project. That means YOU!

- üõ† Want to build a missing component? [We have a guide for that.](CONTRIBUTING.md)

- üêõ Found a bug? Open a [new issue](https://github.com/delucis/astro-embed/issues/new/choose) to let us know.

- üí¨ Want to chat? Jump into [the Astro Discord server](https://astro.build/chat).

name: delucis/astro-og-canvas
description: Generate OpenGraph images for your Astro site

files..github/workflows/ci.yml:
name: CI
permissions: {}

on:
  push:
    branches: [latest]
  pull_request:
    branches: [latest]

# Automatically cancel in-progress actions on the same branch
concurrency:
  group: ${{ github.workflow }}-${{ github.event_name == 'pull_request_target' && github.head_ref || github.ref }}
  cancel-in-progress: true

jobs:
  test:
    strategy:
      matrix:
        os: [ubuntu-latest, windows-latest]
        astro: [^3, ^4, ^5]
    runs-on: ${{ matrix.os }}
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@08c6903cd8c0fde910a37f88322edcfb5dd907a8 # v5.0.0
        with:
          persist-credentials: false

      - uses: pnpm/action-setup@41ff72655975bd51cab0327fa583b6e92b6d3061 # v4.2.0

      - uses: actions/setup-node@a0853c24544627f65ddf259abe73b1d18a591444 # v5.0.0
        with:
          node-version: 18.x

      - run: pnpm i

      - run: pnpm i --workspace-root astro@${{ matrix.astro }}
      - run: pnpm i astro@${{ matrix.astro }}
        working-directory: packages/astro-og-canvas
      - run: pnpm i astro@${{ matrix.astro }}
        working-directory: demo

      - name: Test
        run: pnpm t
files.README.md:
# Astro OG Canvas

## üîó Looking for the main package?

[Jump to `astro-og-canvas` ‚Üí](/packages/astro-og-canvas/)

## üöÄ Project Structure

This project uses **workspaces** to develop a single package from `packages/astro-og-canvas`. It also includes a `demo` Astro site for testing and demonstrating the integration.

## üßû Commands

All commands are run from the root of the project, from a terminal:

| Command        | Action                |
| :------------- | :-------------------- |
| `pnpm install` | Installs dependencies |
| `pnpm test`    | Run unit tests        |

name: delucis/astro-netlify-cms
description: Integration to add Netlify CMS‚Äôs admin dashboard to any Astro project

files.package.json:
{
  "name": "astro-netlify-cms",
  "version": "0.5.4",
  "description": "Add Netlify CMS‚Äôs admin dashboard to your Astro project",
  "repository": "delucis/astro-netlify-cms",
  "homepage": "https://github.com/delucis/astro-netlify-cms",
  "author": "delucis",
  "license": "MIT",
  "type": "module",
  "exports": {
    ".": "./dist/index.js",
    "./cms": "./dist/cms.js",
    "./identity-widget": "./dist/identity-widget.js",
    "./vite-plugin-admin-dashboard": "./dist/vite-plugin-admin-dashboard.js",
    "./admin-dashboard.astro": "./admin-dashboard.astro"
  },
  "types": "./dist/index.d.ts",
  "scripts": {
    "prepack": "tsc",
    "test:smoke": "tsc && cd demo && npm ci && npm run build",
    "test": "npm run test:smoke"
  },
  "keywords": [
    "astro-component",
    "cms",
    "astro",
    "netlify-cms"
  ],
  "dependencies": {
    "@types/react": "^17.0.50",
    "netlify-cms-app": "^2.15.66",
    "netlify-cms-proxy-server": "^1.3.23",
    "netlify-identity-widget": "^1.9.2",
    "react": "^17.0.2",
    "react-dom": "^17.0.2"
  },
  "peerDependencies": {
    "astro": "^1.0.0 || ^2.0.0-beta || ^3.0.0-beta"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@changesets/changelog-github": "^0.4.7",
    "@changesets/cli": "^2.25.0",
    "astro": "^1.5.2"
  }
}
files..github/workflows/ci.yml:
name: CI

on:
  push:
    branches: [latest]
  pull_request:
    branches: [latest]

# Automatically cancel in-progress actions on the same branch
concurrency:
  group: ${{ github.workflow }}-${{ github.event_name == 'pull_request_target' && github.head_ref || github.ref }}
  cancel-in-progress: true

jobs:
  test:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - name: Checkout
        uses: actions/checkout@v3

      - name: Setup Node.js 16.x
        uses: actions/setup-node@v2
        with:
          node-version: 16.x

      - name: Cache node_modules
        uses: actions/cache@v2
        with:
          path: ~/.npm
          key: node-${{ matrix.node }}-${{ hashFiles('**/package-lock.json') }}
          restore-keys: node-${{ matrix.node }}-

      - name: Install Dependencies
        run: npm ci

      - name: Test
        run: npm t
